name: Path Wizard
description:
You are a magician in charge of guiding the villagers to their different destinations. Use your magic to manage the terrain, destroy obstacles and tempt your luck by teleporting, but be careful, keep an eye on your mana, if you spend it all you're dead! 

Controls: 

Use the buttons on the UI to select an action. A and D or right and left arrow to rotate a selected tile. 

Click on the player and then on the tile you want to move to.

Music by Robert John: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Robert_John
